If not, see 22 <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. */ 23 24 /* Implemented from the specification included in the Intel C++ Compiler 25 User Guide and Reference, version 9.0. */ 26 27 #ifndef _PMMINTRIN_H_INCLUDED 28 #define _PMMINTRIN_H_INCLUDED 29 30 /* We need definitions from the SSE2 and SSE header files*/ 31 #include <emmintrin.h> 32 #include <mwaitintrin.h> 33 34 #ifndef __SSE3__ 35 #pragma GCC push_options 36 #pragma GCC target("sse3") 37 #define __DISABLE_SSE3__ 38 #endif /* __SSE3__ */ 39 40 /* Additional bits in the MXCSR. */ 41 #define _MM_DENORMALS_ZERO_MASK 0x0040 42 #define _MM_DENORMALS_ZERO_ON 0x0040 43 #define _MM_DENORMALS_ZERO_OFF 0x0000 44 45 #define _MM_SET_DENORMALS_ZERO_MODE(mode) \ 46 _mm_setcsr ((_mm_getcsr () & ~_MM_DENORMALS_ZERO_MASK) | (mode)) 47 #define _MM_GET_DENORMALS_ZERO_MODE() \ 48 (_mm_getcsr() & _MM_DENORMALS_ZERO_MASK) 49 50 extern __inline __m128 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 51 _mm_addsub_ps (__m128 __X, __m128 __Y) 52 { 53 return (__m128) __builtin_ia32_addsubps ((__v4sf)__X, (__v4sf)__Y); 54 } 55 56 extern __inline __m128 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 57 _mm_hadd_ps (__m128 __X, __m128 __Y) 58 { 59 return (__m128) __builtin_ia32_haddps ((__v4sf)__X, (__v4sf)__Y); 60 } 61 62 extern __inline __m128 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 63 _mm_hsub_ps (__m128 __X, __m128 __Y) 64 { 65 return (__m128) __builtin_ia32_hsubps ((__v4sf)__X, (__v4sf)__Y); 66 } 67 68 extern __inline __m128 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 69 _mm_movehdup_ps (__m128 __X) 70 { 71 return (__m128) __builtin_ia32_movshdup ((__v4sf)__X); 72 } 73 74 extern __inline __m128 __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 75 _mm_moveldup_ps (__m128 __X) 76 { 77 return (__m128) __builtin_ia32_movsldup ((__v4sf)__X); 78 } 79 80 extern __inline __m128d __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 81 _mm_addsub_pd (__m128d __X, __m128d __Y) 82 { 83 return (__m128d) __builtin_ia32_addsubpd ((__v2df)__X, (__v2df)__Y); 84 } 85 86 extern __inline __m128d __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 87 _mm_hadd_pd (__m128d __X, __m128d __Y) 88 { 89 return (__m128d) __builtin_ia32_haddpd ((__v2df)__X, (__v2df)__Y); 90 } 91 92 extern __inline __m128d __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 93 _mm_hsub_pd (__m128d __X, __m128d __Y) 94 { 95 return (__m128d) __builtin_ia32_hsubpd ((__v2df)__X, (__v2df)__Y); 96 } 97 98 extern __inline __m128d __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 99 _mm_loaddup_pd (double const *__P) 100 { 101 return _mm_load1_pd (__P); 102 } 103 104 extern __inline __m128d __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 105 _mm_movedup_pd (__m128d __X) 106 { 107 return _mm_shuffle_pd (__X, __X, _MM_SHUFFLE2 (0,0)); 108 } 109 110 extern __inline __m128i __attribute__((__gnu_inline__, __always_inline__, __artificial__)) 111 _mm_lddqu_si128 (__m128i const *__P) 112 { 113 return (__m128i) __builtin_ia32_lddqu ((char const *)__P); 114 } 115 116 #ifdef __DISABLE_SSE3__ 117 #undef __DISABLE_SSE3__ 118 #pragma GCC pop_options 119 #endif /* __DISABLE_SSE3__ */ 120 121 #endif /* _PMMINTRIN_H_INCLUDED */
